Class com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaBuildWindow 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaObject
           |
           +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaBuildWindow
public class KawaBuildWindow
extends KawaObject
This class is the Kawa build window. This class has only static methods.

KawaBuildWindow()

clearWindow()
Clears the text in the build window.
getWindowText()
Gets the text in the build window.
print(String)
Prints text to the build window and does not go to the next line.
println(String)
Prints text to the build window and breaks to the next line.
showWindow(boolean)
Displays or hides the build window in Kawa

KawaBuildWindow 
 public KawaBuildWindow()

showWindow 
 public static native void showWindow(boolean bShow)
Displays or hides the build window in Kawa

Parameters:
bShow - true or false
print 
 public static native void print(String text)
Prints text to the build window and does not go to the next line.

Parameters:
text - String text to print
println 
 public static native void println(String text)
Prints text to the build window and breaks to the next line.

Parameters:
text - String text to print
clearWindow 
 public static native void clearWindow()
Clears the text in the build window.

getWindowText 
 public static native String getWindowText()
Gets the text in the build window.

Returns:
Build window text
